title: Create development plan (PLAN.md) based on PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION v1.0.0
description:
## WHAT
Create a comprehensive development plan document (PLAN.md) that translates the approved PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION.md v1.0.0 into an actionable implementation roadmap.

## WHY
The specification defines WHAT to build, but we need a plan that defines HOW and WHEN to build it. This plan will:
- Break down the 15 functional requirements into manageable epics and tasks
- Define dependencies between components to ensure correct build order
- Provide effort estimates for resource planning
- Serve as the source for creating all bd issues to track development progress

## HOW
1. Analyze PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION.md to identify all functional requirements (FR-001 to FR-015)
2. Group related FRs into development phases/epics
3. Break each epic into concrete implementation tasks and subtasks
4. Map dependencies between tasks (what must be built first)
5. Add effort estimates (T-shirt sizing or story points)
6. Define a suggested timeline/milestone structure
7. Document in history/PLAN.md following project conventions
